title: 1971–72 Scottish Inter-District Championship
text:
The 1971–72 Scottish Inter-District Championship was a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> competition for Scotland's district teams.
This season saw the 19th <a href="Scottish%20Inter-District%20Championship">Scottish Inter-District Championship</a>.
<a href="Edinburgh%20District%20%28rugby%20union%29">Edinburgh District</a> won the competition after defeating <a href="Glasgow%20District%20%28rugby%20union%29">Glasgow District</a> in a play-off.
